original: After his meeting with Beatrice Frega, William Frega retreated into his Study and locked himself within it. He refused to speak with almost everyone who tried to disturb him.\n\nThe only person he spoke to was Laefe Frega. She told him about the theft of the Sword of Spell Eating a little after 1:00AM. But William didn’t seem to care and returned to his business.
translation:
与比亚特丽丝·弗雷加会面后，威廉·弗雷加回到了自己的书房，把自己锁在里面。他拒绝其他试图打扰的人交谈。



唯一和威廉交谈过的是拉菲·弗雷加。她告诉自己的父亲，噬法之剑在凌晨一点刚过遭窃。但威廉似乎并不在意，又忙起了自己的事。
